It's good, but personally I don't think its worth the hype.

Well I can say, one of the best games I've played in my entire life. This game has an excellent way to continue where Half-Life left off, although some doubts leave, others are solved, but this game has an excellent plot that complements very well with the Half-Life universe. As a final conclusion, I can say that this game I highly recommend if you are interested in games with good gameplay and excellent story. 10/10.
--------- --- -----
Bueno, puedo decir, uno de los mejores juegos que he jugado en toda mi vida. Este juego tiene una excelente manera de continuar donde Half-Life lo dejó, aunque algunas dudas se van, otras se resuelven, pero este juego tiene una excelente trama que se complementa muy bien con el universo Half-Life. Como conclusión final, puedo decir que este juego lo recomiendo mucho si está interesado en juegos con buen juego y excelente historia. 10/10.
better than i expected

Nice

Шикарная игра своего времени.
+Графика и сейчас является превосходной.
+Звуки просто замечательные (а русский дубляж просто космос)
+Музыка потрясающая.
+Сюжет просто потрясающий. Играешь, а будто сам читаешь книгу.
В общем-то одна из лучших игр в которые я когда-либо играл. Она была новой эрой, идеалом своего времени и жанра.
10/10

Simplemente no puedo describir lo que este juego representa, si Half Life innovo en todos los aspectos en el genero de los shooter, Half Life 2 manda a la estratosfera la vara de calidad, simplemente es mucho mejor  en cuanto a mecanicas, jugabilidad, narrativa y en todo los aspectos que lo rodean, no es necesario decir nada más, si eres fanático del género es una compra obligatoria y si es que no, dale una oportunidad, no te arrepentiras
Good Gamr, i likey lot

Jogo fantástico, história envolvente e física inovadora para seu tempo.

I have this game on multiple steam accounts and I have it for the original Xbox, and I have it on the Xbox 360 Orange Box Edition. I've probably played it a million times and it honestly has changed my life.  It also got me into PC Gaming, so I have no idea where I would be now without it.
This is how games should be made, something you do not see very much of at all these days. It is a strong return to the Half-Life universe that keeps on giving even to this day.

Truely, the one videogame that started everything for me.
Without it I wouldn't be who I am today. Personally, for me, the father of all modern story-driven single-player first person shooters, as the successor to it's prequal.
Confirmed by me to be the best video game ever made.
 Thank you Valve.

Nice game!

Half Life 2 is a game that deserves to be remebered.

I would say HL2 is one of Valve's best games yet, yes there are bugs and glitches like any other game but out of all of Valves story driven games HL2 is the best. Yes Portal and Portal 2 
are fun but HL2 has a story that brings you through from start to finish and never really leaves out any details. Valve made a master piece when they released this game and if HL3 never releases ill be fine with HL2. Some people my get bored after a few hours or after beating the game a few times but for me I get nostalgic and good feelings playing HL2 and that's enough to make me want to keep playing.
